Articles.Content:
There is not animation for the mach effects or the reentry flames. Reentry is working because the parts take and orange glow just no flames. I'm using deadly renetry and things explode.

I did a search on this and I saw that the issue is most likely associated with using -force-opengl. There were 2 suggestions to fix this. -force-d3d9 and -force-d3d11. I've tried both and neither work. I have deleted and reinstalled the game but the effecst haven't come back.

How would I disable -force-opengl and return to the normal launch setting?

Thanks
Check your graphics settings. If you have the setting called "Aerodynamic FX Quality" set to a low value, they won't render properly.
Please see the support stickies Delrey, we can't help without your logs ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Sometimes the reentry effects don't appear if you warp time while entering the atmosphere
I'm having the same problem. I've often been told to keep "Aerodynamic FX Quality" at highest, but it didn't work either. Maybe it's something with graphics cards?
